mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, SUM(daily_hours) AS totalHours, COUNT(DISTINCT PROGRAM_NO) AS totalPrograms FROM ( SELECT VAD.member_id, VAD.program_no, ASCH.apply_date, (VP.act_end_time - VP.act_bgn_time) AS daily_hours FROM VOLUNTEER_APPLICATION_DETAIL VAD JOIN VOLUNTEER_PROGRAM VP ON VAD.program_no = VP.program_no JOIN APPLY_SCHEDULE ASCH ON VAD.member_id = ASCH.member_id AND VAD.program_no = ASCH.program_no WHERE VAD.member_id ='태환짱1' AND VAD.stts_no = '6' ) GROUP BY member_id

SELECT member_id AS memberId, COUNT(DISTINCT PROGRAM_NO) AS appliedVolPrograms FROM ( SELECT VAD.member_id, VAD.program_no, ASCH.apply_date, (VP.act_end_time - VP.act_bgn_time) AS daily_hours FROM VOLUNTEER_APPLICATION_DETAIL VAD JOIN VOLUNTEER_PROGRAM VP ON VAD.program_no = VP.program_no JOIN APPLY_SCHEDULE ASCH ON VAD.member_id = ASCH.member_id AND VAD.program_no = ASCH.program_no WHERE VAD.member_id=#{memberId} AND VAD.stts_no = '1' ) GROUP BY member_id
SELECT member_id as memberId, COUNT(program_no) as appliedEduPrograms FROM EDUCATION_APPLICATION_DETAIL WHERE member_id=#{memberId} AND stts_no='1' GROUP BY member_id

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT vad.member_id) AS todayVolunteers FROM volunteer_application_detail VAD JOIN volunteer_program VP ON VAD.program_no = VP.program_no JOIN apply_schedule APS ON VAD.member_id = APS.member_id AND VAD.program_no = APS.program_no WHERE APS.apply_date = CURRENT_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_name, birthdate, member_pw, post_no, address, address_Detail, tel, email, aff_center, hope_ctg, menabled, mrole, reg_date) values (#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{birthdate}, #{memberPw}, #{postNo}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{affCenter}, #{hopeCtg}, #{menabled}, #{mrole}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, birthdate, member_pw, post_no, address, address_detail, tel, email, aff_center, hope_ctg, menabled, mrole from member where member_id = #{memberId}
select count(*) from member where menabled = 1 and mrole = 'ROLE_USER'
mapper.update: update member set post_no = #{postNo}, address = #{address}, address_detail = #{addressDetail}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, aff_center = #{affCenter}, hope_ctg = #{hopeCtg} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select member_id, member_name, email from member where member_name = #{memberName} and email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

select m.member_id as memberId, ci.city_name as cityName, co.county_name as countyName from member m, city ci, county co where m.aff_center = co.county_no and co.city_no = ci.city_no and member_id = #{memberId}
